original: Bökman, Nils Erik Wilhelm, bankdirektör, Göteborg, f. 3/12/95 i Gbg av lektor E. Z. B. o. Sigrid Björkman. G. 24 m. Lisa Melander. Barn: Marie f. 26, g. m. köpm. B. O. Bengtson, Gbg, Gunilla 28, Nils-Peter 33, Lena 37. — Stud:ex. i Halmstad 14, genomg. Gbgs hand :inst. 15. Intr. i Skand. Bankens tjänst 16, kamr. samt förest, f. låneavd. där 39-44, bitr. dir. sed. 44.
translated: Bökman, Nils Erik Wilhelm, bank director, Gothenburg, born December 3rd, 1895 in Gothenburg to lecturer E.Z.B. and Sigrid Björkman. Married to Lisa Melander in 1924. Children: Marie born in 1926, married to merchant B.O. Bengtson in Gothenburg; Gunilla born in 1928; Nils-Peter born in 1933; Lena born in 1937. Bökman passed his high school exam in Halmstad in 1914, and completed his studies at Gothenburg's commercial institute in 1915. He began working for Skandinaviska Banken in 1916 as a clerk and became the director of the loan department from 1939 to 1944. He then worked as the deputy director.
